info.description:
This KankuFile supports developers in 

* developing kanku
* testing kanku
* setting up VMs for kanku in server/developer mode

The following jobs are available:
  * sm: create tested kanku vm in server mode
  * dm: create tested kanku vm in developer mode
  * tm: create kanku vm in testing mode and run resonable test suites
  * cl: cleanup - remove domains like `kanku destroy` does 
        (for usage in job_groups)

You can start each job separatly with:

  `kanku up -j <job_name>`

Enjoy YLWK!

This KankuFile creates a VM based on Fedora 39 and 
installs kanku in developer mode and runs
`kanku setup --devel`
info.summary: Create VM based on Fedora 39 and install kanku in devel mode
Create VM based on openSUSE Tumbleweed (ext4) and install kanku in devel mode
info.description:
This KankuFile executes the following steps:

* create a VM 
* install kanku-cli
* setup kanku in developer mode

info.summary: Create VM based on Fedora 39 and install kanku in devel mode
info.description:
This KankuFile creates a VM based on Fedora 39 and 
installs kanku in developer mode and runs
`kanku setup devel`
